x.Description: REQUIRED. Recorded position along the x-axis

y.Description: REQUIRED. Recorded position along the y-axis

z.Description: REQUIRED. Recorded position along the z-axis

size.Description: Surface area of the electrode in mm^2

hemisphere.Description: Hemisphere in which the electrode is placed

seizure_zone.Description: Conclusion drawn by an epileptologist on electrode involvement in the seizures

Levels.SOZ: Seizure Onset Zone, the region where the recorded clinical seizures started during the recording period
Levels.IrritativeZone: Region of cortex that generates interictal epileptiform discharges, but not seizures
Levels.EarlyPropagationZone: Seizures propagate into this region within first 3 seconds after seizure onset. Not seizure onset
Levels.Resected: Region of cortex that was resected
Levels.ResectedEdge: Region of cortex that is within 1 cm of the edge of the resected area

Destrieux_label.Description: Label number according to the Destrieux Brain Atlas obtained from Freesurfer

Destrieux_label_text.Description: Label name of the brain region according to the Destrieux Brain Atlas obtained from Freesurfer
